SelectDate.Info: Select a date below and prepare to jump
SelectDate.Waiting:
Strap in—the more activities you play and the further you jump, the longer this'll take!

Bungie's API doesn't enable requesting activity history from a specific period, so we're doing a drive-by.

Graphs.SelectDate: Select a date with activities played from the graph above.

Activity.SelectModeInfo: To drill down to a specific activity, select a mode from the interface above

You can sync your bookmarks by enabling sync in _Settings_.

Credits.Info:
Braytech has been, and continues to be, a multipurpose facility for its developer to practice and learn how to better program and work with others. It started out as a cool hobby to help pass the time and transformed into a bit of a monster.

Destiny's third party developer community is a somewhat unique phenomenon and is very special. It enables great people to do great things, backed by community values. We build for everyone.

Privacy.Info:
The long and skinny of it is that Braytech doesn't use cookies or any other mechanism to track you, nor does it target you for advertising purposes (I mean, Braytech doesn't have any ads).

If you have any questions further to the point of this notice, feel free to jump into the [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech).
Privacy.Policy:
1.  Introduction
    1. For all purposes, this English language version of this Privacy Policy shall be the original, governing instrument, and understanding of the parties. In the event of any conflict between this English language version of this Privacy Policy and any subsequent translation into any other language, this English language version shall govern and control.
    2. Braytech is a free fan made service for Destiny 2, the video game. This privacy policy explains how your data is used by this application.
    3. Braytech is constantly improving, and the developer may modify this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in their privacy practices. You are encouraged to review this Privacy Policy periodically and to check the date at the end of the Privacy Policy for the most recent version.
    4. Herein, the "developer" refers to Tom Chapman.
2. Information the developer collects
    1. Information provided by You
        1. Your platform specific profile name is used to load and display your Destiny profile. At no point are your private credentials collected or used.
        2. Patrons of Braytech may also optionally provide their email address as a means to associate their Destiny profile with their Patreon account in order to receive the appropriate flair for their Patreon pledge.
    2. Information the developer automatically collects
        1. Data regarding your usage of the services provided including your IP address, geographical location, browser name and version, operating system, referral source, length of visit, page views, and navigation paths, as well as information about the timing, frequency, and pattern of your service use.
3. How your personal data is used
    1. Destiny and Bungie account info
        1. In order to display and manipulate Destiny game information, Braytech uses the Bungie.net API. The only information Braytech receives, or has access to, is your game information (items, characters, etc.) and basic account information including your Bungie.net membership ID, and the identifiers of any linked services such as your public PSN, Xbox Live, Steam, Stadia, Blizzard, or Bungie.net usernames. The developer does not have access to your email, name, address, payment information, or any other personal information held by Bungie or the game platforms.
        2. Use of the Bungie.net API is governed by the [Terms of Use](https://www.bungie.net/7/en/Legal/Terms) and [Privacy Policy](https://www.bungie.net/7/en/Legal/PrivacyPolicy) for Bungie.net.
    2. Patreon
        1. The data provided by you, the user, for the purpose of associating your Destiny profile with your Patreon account is only ever used for that fact, stored securely through Voluspa.
    3. Usage data
        1. This usage data may be processed for the purposes of analysing the use of the website and services. The legal basis for this processing is your consent or our legitimate interests, namely monitoring and improving our website and services.
    4. Braytech settings sync
        1. Voluspa enables a Braytech feature which allows you, the user, to store your data (Braytech settings) and sync it between instances of Braytech. This information is only accessible to you and the developer.

Last updated Wednesday, May 19, 2021.

ErrorBoundary.Discord: Braytech has encountered a fatal error. If one of the available actions does not resolve your issue, please join the [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech) for further assistance.
ErrorBoundary.Version: Please quote the following when reporting this error.

FriendlyError.Description: Please, do not tell Commander Zavala... Yet.
FriendlyError.Name: Pardon Our Dust

NetworkError.Description: A network error has occurred. This is a temporary error which may be resolved by reloading or navigating away from this view.
NetworkError.Name: Network Error

ServiceWorkerInstalling.Description: An app update is installing in the background.

ServiceWorkerReload.Description:
A fresh update for Braytech is available. Please select reload to use a better version of this app.

Check the change log on the index view for details on what's new.

UnsupportedBrowser.Description:
Braytech requires modern browser features in order to operate. If you encounter this message, it's time to move on to something new.

A Chromium-based browser such as Microsoft Edge is recommended.@className=warning@
UnsupportedBrowser.Name: Unsupported Browser

Grimoire.Description:
The lore of old, Destiny 1's Grimoire cards are backed up, archived, and preserved here. Grimoire is a database within Destiny. Entries were unlocked through playing the game in the form of "cards."

The list of Grimoire entries is sorted into six main categories—Guardian, Inventory, Allies, Enemies, Places, and Activities. Each of these categories has a number of sub-categories.
Grimoire.Name: Grimoire

Data.Description: Delete the authentication data stored on your device. While unnecessary, this function is provided for your peace of mind.
Data.Name: Authentication Data

NoAuth.Description:
Some features of Braytech require your written permission to activate, generally to protect your privacy.

To use this feature, please tell Bungie that you approve. No personal information is shared by doing so—only an authentication code with which you may interact with more API endpoints.
NoAuth.Name: Authentication Required

DiffProfile.Description:
You are not authorised to access a different user's profile data, but you may use these helpful links to return to your own.

You can find more information regarding your authentication in the _Settings_ view.
DiffProfile.Name: Oh, honey... Honnnnneyyyy

Friends.Text: Authenticate with Bungie.net to see your Bungie friends list here! It's a handy shortcut to see who's on and to check each other's profiles!

Memberships.Description: These are the memberships that are currently associated with your Bungie.net profile.
Memberships.Name: Associated Memberships

Auth.PatronOnlyFeature: This is a patron-only feature. Some features are made possible only with patron support. Learn more at [https://patreon.com/braytech](https://patreon.com/braytech).

PatreonAssociation.Description: Associate this Bungie.net profile with a Patreon account.
PatreonAssociation.Name: Patreon Association
PatreonAssociation.Success: Thanks! Your email is now associated with your profile.
PatreonAssociation.Text: Some Patreon tiers include rewards in the form of _flair_ which is displayed at the side of your player name. Enable display of relevant flair by entering the email associated with your Patreon account.

Suggestion.Subtle: Authenticate with Bungie.net to load your profile and unlock tonnes of features.
Suggestion.Text: Most of Braytech's features are available to all users and depend on publically available data, but some of Destiny's features require more explicit access permissions which you can grant to Braytech by authenticating with Bungie.net.

DIMSync.Description: This feature requires DIM Sync to function. Enable DIM Sync in _Settings_.
DIMSync.Name: DIM Sync

Character.DiffProfile: You're viewing someone else's profile. You can look but if you try to push buttons, don't expect results!

Administration.ViewportWidth: Administration is intended for use on larger displays. Please use a display with a viewport of atleast `1280px`.

ClanBannerBuilder.Description: Collaborate with clan members on a new clan banner: make your selections and tap Share to show off your style.
ClanBannerBuilder.Name: Clan Banner Builder

HistoricalStats.ViewportWidth: Historical stats is intended for use on larger displays. Please use a display with a viewport of atleast `1024px`.

NoClan.Description:
Clans are optional groups of friends that enhance your online gaming experience. Coordinate with your clanmates to take on co-op challenges or just simply represent them in your solo play to earn extra rewards.

Join your friend's clan, meet some new friends, or create your own on the companion app or at [Bungie.net](https://bungie.net/).
NoClan.Name: No clan affiliation

Relationships.Description: Discover missed opportunities and secret lovers. These Guardians are those who you play most activities with. Cherish each other.
Relationships.Name: Relationships
Relationships.NoFriends: You're not alone–you'll make a friend eventually... Invite a clan friend to hang out for a few activities!
Relationships.NoParters: No one said dating was easy. Back to the fight, Guardian!

LimitCurrentSeason.Name: Current Season

LimitGroupMembers.Description: Filter encounters and fireteams to only include members of your clan.
LimitGroupMembers.Name: Clan Members

Relationships.SocialButterfly: You get around! You've played with everyone this season.

Commonality.Description: Percentage of players who are crawled and assessed by Voluspa who've completed this badge.
Commonality.Name: Badge Commonality

Collectible.Commonality: Percentage of players who are crawled and assessed by Voluspa who've discovered this collectible.

Collections.CollectiblesAcquired: You have acquired all of these collectibles and chosen to hide them.

Common.CharacterSpecific: As is with most Braytech features, this view is character-specific.
Common.Name: Name
Common.NoActivitiesAvailable: There aren't any activities available to you. Perhaps you don't meet the requirements...

StatDiscrepancy.Description:
There are multiple sources for stats in Destiny. Clan Historical Stats is based on the HistoricalStats API endpoint while others source their data from PGCRs (Post Game Carnage Reports). It's hard to determine which holds the most accurate truth.

To display stats in the manner seen on Clan Historical Stats would require downloading terabytes of data from Bungie servers and significant compute power. This said, they're accurate enough for some friendly competition.
StatDiscrepancy.Name: Clan Historical Stats don't match [other thing]

AppStore.Description: Braytech is available on Apple's [App Store](https://apps.apple.com/app/braytech/id1593151816), [Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=braytech.org.twa), and the [Microsoft Store](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/braytech/9pmp910vslz8)!
AppStore.Name: App stores

Commonality.Description:
Commonly asked, "What is the funny percentage to the right of collectibles and records?"

It's a percentage of players who've either discovered or redeemed the item. Every few days, _Voluspa_ collects data from users of _Braytech_ and takes note of who's got what.

It's been a hot topic as to whether it's accurate or useful and the truth is that all statistics are useless and dumb _unless_ you've included every single piece of data possible.

It's fair to assume that these stats are bias towards casual players (percentages may appear higher rather than lower due to the skill and attention of the users that are monitored).

Where available, tooltips for these stats include the total number of players who are counted as a part of this metric.{{crawled}}
Commonality.Name: Commonality

KeyboardShortcuts.Description: In addition to any action bar buttons with key symbols, Braytech has a variety of hidden keyboard shortcuts. From any view with a profile header (your character emblem, etc.), press and hold  to see which shortcuts are available. For example, press  to go to _Triumphs_ and  to return here.
KeyboardShortcuts.Name: Keyboard Shortcuts

ProfilePrivacy.Description:
If you're concerned for your privacy while playing Destiny and how the API exposes your progression and activities for use by third parties, you may alter your privacy settings on [Bungie.net](https://www.bungie.net/7/en/User/Account/Privacy).

Doing so will require that you authenticate Braytech with Bungie for continued use.
ProfilePrivacy.Name: Profile privacy

ServiceWorkerUpdate.Description:
From the _Settings_ view, you can try a variety of things. Start by selecting _Update Service Worker_.

If this fails, you can try reloading the app by selecting _Reload App_. If the problem continues to persist, please select _Dump Service Worker_ and report the issue via Discord.
ServiceWorkerUpdate.Name: Braytech won't update

Widgets.Description:
Widgets are currently only available for iOS devices (iPhone, iPad).

If you can't find Braytech or its widgets in your list of available widgets, try restarting your device, launching the app, reinstalling the app, or waiting an arbitrary time duration.

It's either a skill issue or just an iOS thing. Good luck.
Widgets.Name: Widgets
Widgets.Video1Caption: How to add widgets to your home screen.
Widgets.Video2Caption: How to add widgets to your lock screen.

About.Description: _Voluspa_, named after a sub-mind of _Rasputin_, is what I've named the serverside component of Braytech. It's responsible for collating the profile data of Braytech's users for commonality statistics, settings sync, and other key features.
About.Name: About Voluspa

Header.Description:
Welcome to Braytech! Before you get started, I've got a handful of tips for you.

If you have feedback or questions, we can chat on Discord or you can check out the FAQ!
Header.Name: Getting Started

Search.Description:
Need to find something quick? Braytech has a search HUD, available anywhere in the app.

Press **** or tap ****, and start typing!
Search.Name: Search

Settings.Description:
Braytech is jam-packed full of settings from dark themes to item visibility options to settings sync.

Find **** in the top corner.
Settings.Name: Settings

Views.Description: See all of Braytech's features at a glance by selecting **** from the top of the app!
Views.Name: More

Blog.Error: Blog posts couldn't be loaded at this time.
Blog.Name: Blog

CallToAction.Text: Explore Destiny through Braytech for sweet gains and insight into your fights against the forces of Darkness

Features.Description:
A project of pure passion, Braytech is years of experience, incremental additions, and improvements. While its original goal was professional development, it has since swelled into a staple of many Destiny players' experiences as Guardians.

Braytech started as a checklist app and has bellowed into a monstrosity of many talents. It's always being refined and expanded.

Need to find something quick? Press  and start typing! Braytech has a search HUD, available anywhere in the app.

Braytech is built for desktop users first, but functions as well and looks as beautiful on smaller devices. In fact, there's an [iPhone app](https://apps.apple.com/app/braytech/id1593151816) and an [Android app](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=braytech.org.twa).

Want to make a suggestion? Join the [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech)!
Features.Name: Braytech

Support.Description:
Braytech is a full-time job—I design and develop to improve myself and to please you. I'm anti-ads, to my own demise. Your support helps me keep the lights on and allows me to do my best work.

Join the [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech) and the other patrons in the Braytech Research Division.
Support.Name: Are you a fan? Show your support

Activity.Description:
A Ghost's Guardian

Your life after your life begins here. You are a risen, chosen by a Ghost, and bestowed with great power through Light and Darkness.

These were your first steps.
Activity.Name: First Risen

Commonality.Description:
Triumph and claim your rewards

Earth and worlds beyond touched by the Traveler hold wonderful oddities and sought-after treasures of myth.

The fun is in the chase.
Commonality.Name: Rare Treasures & Exotic Style

Fishing.Description:
Catch of the day

Cast a weighted line, showcase your aquarium, and get competitive comparing your heftiest catches with your fellow anglers.
Fishing.Name: Competitive Fishing

Ranks.Description:
Through boldness to the stars

Lead fireteams to victory against minions of the Darkness and compete against one another in the Crucible for accolades from Lord Shaxx himself.

Guardian.Description: Prepare to be evaluated by the Light and your peers.
Guardian.Name: Guardian

Ranks.Name: Guardian Standing

Seals.Commonality:
Emblems of victory

The ultimate measure of a completionist and collector; wear them well.
Seals.Name: Triumph Seals

BungieError.Description:
Crucial API data couldn't be loaded at this time. This is an intermittent issue. Please try again.

If this error does persist, the API may be experiencing a wider outage or your local network is restricting Bungie API requests.
BungieError.Name: Bungie Error

Error.Description: Something very unexpected and irrecoverable occurred.

IndexedDBError.Description:
Something went wrong while trying to access browser storage.

If this error occurs again, your browser or device may be incompatible or improperly configured.

IndexedDBErrorFatal.Description:
Something went wrong while trying to access browser storage.

Please reload the app and try again.

IndexedDBOpenFailedError.Description:
Something went wrong while trying to access browser storage.

Some browsers disallow access to _Indexed DB_ when browsing in private modes.

Please reload the app and try again.

MaintenanceError.Description:
The Bungie API is currently down for maintenance.

Tune into @BungieHelp on Twitter for more information.
MaintenanceError.Name: Bungie Maintenance

ManifestDownloadError.Description:
Something went wrong while trying to download the manifest from Bungie.

Please reload the app and try again.
ManifestDownloadError.Name: Manifest download failed

ManifestError.Description:
Something went wrong while trying to update the manifest with Bungie.

Please reload the app and try again.
ManifestError.Name: Manifest error

NoInternetError.Description: Are you offline? Your web browser thinks you are...

Please reload the app and try again.

Screenshots.Description:
Proposed screenshots must meet a strict quality criteria:
- display resolution of 1920x1080
- no visible HUD
- no visible Guardians or equipment
- no visible enemies
- maximum video settings
  - including a render resolution of 200%

Results are prioritised by name, source, and description.

PushNotifications.BraveBrowser: You appear to be using a silly browser, Brave: please ensure "Use Google services for push messaging" is enabled in your browser's settings.
PushNotifications.Incompatible: Your browser doesn't support push notifications yet.
PushNotifications.Info:
Push notifications use browser and operating system APIs to send you notifications even when you're not using the app.

If you want Braytech to send you notifications, you can control if, when, and why, here.
PushNotifications.NoServiceWorker: A service worker hasn't been installed yet. Try reloading Braytech.

PreviewNotifications.Description: Select to preview configured notifications. Voluspa will dispatch them to your device immediately.
PreviewNotifications.Name: Preview Notifications

PushNotifications.ServiceWorkerInstalling: A service worker is installing. Please wait.

ReloadRequired.Description: Select reload app to activate your changes immediately.
ReloadRequired.Name: Reload Required

Reports.Info: Once downloaded, reports are saved to device storage for rapid access after the fact. All reports are associated with the member through which they were originally viewed. You can clear them here, member by member. You may wish to do this in order to minimise initial load time, if you've downloaded many reports.
Reports.NoReports: No reports are stored on this device.

HideFeatureSuggestions.Description: Hold your breath–I know what I'm doing.
HideFeatureSuggestions.Name: Hide Feature Suggestions

ItemVisibilityOverride.Description: Use this setting to override global Item Visibility settings for records and collectibles.
ItemVisibilityOverride.Name: Show Completed and Acquired

DeleteSyncedSettings.Name: Delete Synced Settings

DownloadSyncedSettings.Description: Download synced settings immediately, overwriting current settings.
DownloadSyncedSettings.Name: Download Synced Settings

Enable.Description: Enable sync and regularly sync with Voluspa.

Sync.Info: Sync your settings for item visibility, maps, tracked triumphs, and profile search history.
Sync.RequirementsNotMet: Synchronisation requires that you first authenticate Braytech with Bungie.net.

PromptForMinorVersions.Description: Notify me to update even for minor versions.
PromptForMinorVersions.Name: Minor Version Updates

ReloadAppAutomatically.Description: When an update for Braytech is ready, reload the app automatically irregardless of what you're doing.
ReloadAppAutomatically.Name: Reload App Automatically

SystemPreference.Name: Match System
SystemPreference.Description: Where supported, Braytech will mirror your system preference.

DumpServiceWorker.Description: Attempt to unregister the installed service worker. If successful, reloading the app will allow a new service worker to take its place.
DumpServiceWorker.Name: Dump Service Worker

UpdateServiceWorker.Description: Attempt to update the service worker immediately. This function will disable the button temporarily. You may continue to use Braytech while it attempts to update in the background. If successful, you will be prompted to reload the app.
UpdateServiceWorker.Name: Update Service Worker

Gay.Description: Gay it up, bitch. Light up your life with fabulous, limited edition, ground-shattering, Braytech® exclusive! technological innovation.
Gay.Name: Enable 🌈

ReducedMotion.Description: Reduce the motion of the user interface, namely by disabling various animations. Reduces CPU usage.
ReducedMotion.Name: Reduced Motion

Failure.Description: Your settings could not be deleted at this time. This is a temporary failure.

Success.Description: Your settings have been deleted. Sync is now disabled.

Failure.Description: While trying to merge your settings, there was an error. This is a temporary failure.
While trying to sync your settings, there was an error. This is a temporary failure.

AlmostComplete.NonePartiallyComplete: No partially completed triumphs. Choose an objective and get started!

Classified.Description: This record is classified and may be revealed at a later time.
Classified.Name: Classified Record

Details.NoClanOrFireteam: Join a fireteam or a clan to see how your fellow Guardians stack up next to you!

LegacyTriumphs.Description: Triumphs from the past, these records are no longer obtainable but are preserved here for posterity and review.

Commonality.Description: Percentage of players who are crawled and assessed by Voluspa who've completed this record.

Expiration.Description: This record may no longer be obtainable once expired.

Record.Expires: Expires at the end of Season {{season}}

Score.Description: This record's finite triumph score value.

ScoreInterval.Description: The next unredeemed interval's score value over the total record value.

Triumphs.RecordsRedeemed: You have redeemed all of these records and chosen to hide them.
Triumphs.RecordsUnavailable: There are no records available for display.

Commonality.Description: Percentage of players who are crawled and assessed by Voluspa who've acquired this title.
Commonality.Name: Seal Commonality

CommonalityGilded.Description: Percentage of players who are crawled and assessed by Voluspa who've acquired and gilded this title.
CommonalityGilded.Name: Gilded Seal Commonality

Secret.Description: A mystery that you haven't yet unraveled.
Secret.Name: Secret Triumph

Tracked.NoTrackedRecords: You aren't tracking any records yet!

Unredeemed.Info: Revel in your triumphs and redeem these records.
Unredeemed.InfoWithScoreValue: Redeem these records and increase your triumph score by {{value}} points.

Auth.Description: Want to see your objectives and other progress data? Authenticate with Bungie.net and allow Braytech to securely read your profile data.

Patreon.Description:
Ads suck so Braytech doesn't use them, but none of this is free or easy!

In place of targeted advertising, Braytech's developer depends on your generosity. Your support helps keep the app online, enables the developer to work on new features, and pays the rent!
Patreon.Name: Help keep the lights on 🥺
Patreon.RewardResearcher: Unlock the Researcher medal, a symbol of dedication and commitment to bettering humankind.
Patreon.RewardSubmind: Unlock the animated Warmind gold tier medal. Every Warmind medal guarenteed to contain at least 7.00% Warmind fragment dust™
Patreon.Rewards: Unlock unique profile medals when you subscribe to Braytech's Patreon!
Patreon.Leaderboards: Leaderboards are a lot of work, which while thought-provoking, is particularly costly. I had to buy Databases for Dummies and everything. If you like collecting things, maybe we could [interest you in unlocking some rare flair](https://www.patreon.com/braytech) for your member link?

Profile.Description: Want to see your objective progress, redeemed records, discovered collectibles, and way more? Load your profile and select your character.

FailureStrings.UniquenessViolation: Can only hold one at a time

AdjustGraph.Description:
View this data in a different manner by selecting an alternate type of graph.

_Voluspa_ collects data from {{crawled}} players. Of those players, {{assessed}} were successfully assessed for the purpose of providing this data. Of {{assessed}} assessed players, {{value}} have discovered this collectible.
AdjustGraph.Description_record:
View this data in a different manner by selecting an alternate type of graph.

_Voluspa_ collects data from {{crawled}} players. Of those players, {{assessed}} were successfully assessed for the purpose of providing this data. Of {{assessed}} assessed players, {{value}} have completed this record.
AdjustGraph.Name: Adjust Graph

Voluspa.Crawled: {{number}} players are currently crawled by Voluspa.

ArtifactPower.Description: A bonus to your Light level, channeled by your equipped seasonal artifact through experience gained.
ArtifactPower.Name: Artifact Power Bonus

GearPower.Description: The average Power level of your currently equipped armaments.
GearPower.Name: Gear Power

Challenges.NoChallenges: You've smashed all of your available challenges this week!

Power.Description: Your Light level is an aggregate of the Power value across all of your currently equipped gear. A higher Light level improves both your damage output and your defense.
Power.Name: Light

SeasonalChallenges.Description: Complete limited-time challenges for Season rank, Bright Dust, and other rewards.
SeasonalChallenges.Name: Seasonal Challenges

Rotations.Description: Rituals that run on a rotation, use these projections to plan your endeavours. Rotations are sometimes altered by the Architects and this view will be altered accordingly.
Rotations.Name: Rotations
